Query: How do I mount a hibernated NTFS partition?

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_748163: Unable to mount NTFS partition (no hibernation)
au_841497: How to mount a partition?
ul_491098: Cannot chown, chmod on mounted ntfs partition
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_491098: getRUI4() { od -An -N4 -tu4 /dev/random | tr -d ' '; }
USERMAPPING=/media/NTFS_PARTITION/.NTFS-3G/UserMapping
echo ":users:S-1-5-21-$(getRUI4)-$(getRUI4)-$(getRUI4)-513" | sudo tee -a $USERMAPPING >/dev/null
echo "$(id -un):$(id -gn):S-1-5-21-$(getRUI4)-$(getRUI4)-$(getRUI4)-1001" | sudo tee -a $USERMAPPING >/dev/null
